Others: The match between Pakistan and Ireland in the T20 World Cup 2024 is taking place today in Florida. Both teams are out of the tournament and aiming to end their campaigns with a win.
Pakistan's team morale is low after their poor performance, with the players skipping practice on Saturday.
The match's outcome may depend on whether they can finish on a high note or if the weather will impact the game again.
The Central Broward Park & Broward County Stadium pitch is batting-friendly, but current weather conditions may make it slow, favoring pacers over spinners.
Rain in Lauderhill affected the venue, with the India-Canada match abandoned. The outfield remains wet, and the match conditions for today are uncertain.
